title: Anything But
description: "Gabardine whispers, combustible sweets, weapons of mass meringue, blue-hairs abound... pure insanity! Will you laugh... or cry? The layer between is thin, dear reader. Beware!"A raw look into the human mind, "Anything But" is a slippery gauntlet between real and surreal, with all the honesty of thumbtacks and leprechauns in a shower stall.Warning: "gawdy" is used shamelessly in the spirit of this tale!
author: Byron Suggs
